abstract: A new Reuters profile of David Solomon, the co-head of investment banking at Goldman Sachs, posits that he may be in the running to be the firm’s next chief executive.
snippet: A new Reuters profile of David Solomon, the co-head of investment banking at Goldman Sachs, posits that he may be in the running to be the firm’s next chief executive.
lead_paragraph: Is David Solomon the next Lloyd C. Blankfein?

headline.main: A Dark Horse Candidate to Succeed Goldman’s Blankfein
